Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 廹

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:迫

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+8FEB

Main pronunciation 主要发音: pò

Other pronunciations 其它发音: pò,pǎi

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to be near.

English senses 英语理解: coerce, force, compel; urgent

Usage example 用法举例: 強迫 qiǎng pò (force)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1162

Shuowen 说文解字: 近也從辵白聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 廹 older 迫 from (rem- 廴 yǐn) from road-and-foot 辶辶辵 chuò and phonetic white-moon 白 bái C448 迫<廹> simp 迫.

廹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pò］
［《廣韻》博陌切，入陌，幫。］
亦作“廹1”。“伯4”的被通假字。
(1)逼近；接近。
(2)逼迫；强迫。
(3)催促。
(4)紧迫；急迫。
(5)狭窄。
(6)困厄；窘迫。
(7)谓烘烤。
(8)闭，笼罩。
[②]［pǎi］
亦作“廹2”。
见“迫2擊炮”。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pò］
["Guang Yun" Bo Mo cut, enter Mo, help. ]
Also known as "廹1". "Bo 4" was passed falsely.
(1) Approaching; approaching.
(2) Forced; forced.
(3) Urge.
(4) Urgent; urgent.
(5) Narrowness.
(6) Distress; embarrassment.
(7) Said baking.
(8) Closed, shrouded.
